name: The National Library of Geometric Impossibilities
name_original: The National Library of Geometric Impossibilities
description:
Shelve books in a paradoxical library.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 42.

Controls:
WASD: Move
Space: Jump
Left-Click: Interact
Mouse: Look
Esc: Free mouse
Esc, Q: Quit
F4: Fullscreen

Known Issues and Fixes

  • If you get a crash with the message 'Fatal Error: Can not create vertex buffer of size 147456 bytes' or similar try downloading the TNLoGI-VertexCompatible.exe version of the game. (Please let me know whether this fixes the issue for you)
  • If you get an error along the lines of 'FATAL ERROR in Vertex Shader compilation' you may not have DirectX Runtime. This can be installed here: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=35

You can contact me on Twitter at @Nanolotl
